home.title: Cincinnati
home.blurb: Following 4 years in NYC, and 1 in Dayton, OH, I am now in Cincinnati. I wish I were closer to hiking areas to see a bit more nature, but maybe that'll be for the next moveâ€¦!

book.title: Billy Summers
book.blurb: The setup so far has been super interesting even if nothing has really happened. I guess King is a writer that can make anything interesting. Eager to read some more!

game.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
game.blurb: Just finished this lovely French game that had quite the rich soundtrack (14th century string instruments just hit differently) and interesting characters and story. I usually dislike playing with French audio but turned out pretty well this time!

game.title: Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores
game.blurb: A little additional content for a great game from last year? Yes please! It's got an intriguing story with amazing music and gorgeous landscape.

show.title: Trailer Park Boys
show.blurb: This is a fun, if dark-humoured, mockumentary show that's been great to watch during lunch breaks. I had never watched any of it but knew of a couple of memes, and now I get it. Bubbles is the best part of the show!

music.title: Fall Out Boy
music.blurb: While I was never a superfan, I started really listening to FOB's music after their peak of success when I was in high school. Now I can just enjoy it, and their latest album is excellent. Don't miss out!

music.title: Sleep Token
music.detail: Sundowning / This Place Will Become Your Tomb
music.blurb: Okay, so I randomly stumbled upon this band on YouTube and my goodness, they are _fantastic_. I'm getting really hyped up for their next album, "Take Me Back to Eden" coming out mid-May as the already-released tracks are incredible. They hit a plethora of styles and I absolutely love it.

sports.title: Running
sports.blurb: I started running back in September 2022, and I am now training for my first race in May, which is a 10K. I will sweat. I might swear. But I will go through with this.
